item.description: Fall is officially here, which means snow is just around the corner!! Come join the Innitous at the Ski & Snowboard Expo where you will find great deals on ski and snowboard gear and apparel as well as discounts on winter vacations. Tickets are now on sale for $12. Click here to purchase your ticket or you can purchase your ticket at the door. https://v2.interactiv... After the Expo we are heading to Whiskey Priest (150 Northern Avenue Boston, MA ) to watch the Boston Bruins take on the Buffalo Sabres. Hope you can join us!!

group.name: Innitou Ski Runners & Rider's Activities Club of New England

item.name: Ski & Snowboard Expo and Bruins Game!
